product_desc:
The Artists Den is a critically acclaimed television and digital music series now in its 10th season and best known for presenting secret concerts by extraordinary artists in non-traditional, often historic settings on the series Live from the Artists Den . Live from the Artists Den is one of PBS' most popular series, broadcasting nationally in US markets and internationally. 

Artists who have performed for the Artists Den include Adele, Mumford & Sons, Ed Sheeran, Zac Brown Band, Robert Plant, Soundgarden, Tim McGraw, Norah Jones, Sheryl Crow, Sara Bareilles, Vampire Weekend, Kid Rock, Ringo Starr, and Elvis Costello.
name: Artists Den Entertainment
